ack.p: The authors would like to thank the following advisors for helping us frame the scope of this project: Dr. Nicholas Ogden (PHAC), Dr. Harvey Artsob (Retired—PHAC), Dr. Martin Petric (Retired—BCCDC), Dr. Raymond Tellier (U Calgary), Dr. Victor Ng (PHAC) and Dr. Pablo Martinez de Salazar (CARPHA). We would also like to thank Danielle Reimer and Catherine Hierlihy for their help with reviewing articles, together with Janet Harris and the PHAC librarians for their assistance with library services.
